q1.question: What is mind mapping?
q1.answer: Mind mapping is a visual thinking technique that helps organize information, brainstorm ideas, and see connections between concepts. It uses a central topic with branches for related ideas, making it easier to understand complex subjects and remember information.

q2.question: Is this mind map tool really free?
q2.answer: Yes! Our core mind mapping features are completely free with no time limits. You can create unlimited mind maps, collaborate in real-time, and export to multiple formats without paying anything. We believe everyone should have access to powerful thinking tools.

q3.question: Do I need to create an account?
q3.answer: No account is required to start creating mind maps. Your maps are saved locally in your browser. If you want to access your maps across devices or collaborate with others, you can optionally create a free account.

q4.question: Can I collaborate with my team in real-time?
q4.answer: Absolutely! Share a link with your team and everyone can edit the mind map simultaneously. You'll see each other's cursors and changes in real-time, just like Google Docs. Perfect for brainstorming sessions and remote collaboration.

q5.question: What export formats are supported?
q5.answer: You can export your mind maps to PDF, PNG, SVG, PowerPoint (PPTX), XMind, Markdown, and JSON formats. This makes it easy to share your work, create presentations, or import into other tools.

q6.question: Is my data secure?
q6.answer: Yes. Your mind maps are stored securely and only accessible to you and people you explicitly share with. We use industry-standard encryption and never sell your data. You can also export your maps and delete your account anytime.

q7.question: Can I use it offline?
q7.answer: Yes! Once loaded, the mind map tool works offline. Your changes are saved locally and will sync automatically when you're back online. Perfect for working on flights or in areas with poor connectivity.

q8.question: Which devices are supported?
q8.answer: Our mind map tool works on all modern browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge) on desktop, laptop, tablet, and mobile devices. The interface adapts to your screen size for the best experience.
